items.title: Appeals court denies Trump effort to halt full SNAP benefits for November
items.description: Back-and-forth court rulings have led to confusion and frustration over SNAP subsidies that help 42 million recipients pay for groceries.

items.title: These are the Democrats who broke ranks to vote for the shutdown deal

items.title: A Rastafarian goes to the Supreme Court after a prison shaved his dreadlocks
items.description: The question is not whether Damon Landor was mistreated but whether he can sue the individual prison officials and guards for damages.
